EmailTemplate.name: 201805_Global_Email_TFE731 Exchanges_Channel Partner Emails_JRD.201805_Global_Nu
EmailTemplate.subject: Major TFE731 Engine Maintenance Inspection Got Your Customer Down?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Valued Channel Partner,
Is your customer’s aircraft ready for a major engine maintenance inspection? Are they contemplating grounding their aircraft?
With Honeywell’s TFE731 certified engine exchange program, you can exchange your customer’s run-of-the-mill engine for one of our certified, pre-owned TFE731 engines. Plus, they’ll receive a trade-in credit and free shipping for their old engine!
Don’t let their aircraft sit any longer. Purchase a TFE731 outright or exchange your customer’s TFE731 engine with us – it’s that simple.
And the best part? Honeywell channel partners can receive a discount on eligible TFE731 engines.
Browse our certified, pre-owned inventory and choose the engine that’s right for your customer today.
VIEW ENGINE LISTINGS <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/services-and-support/godirect-services/certified-engine-exchanges]]>
